IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS SOFTWARE.


1. LICENSE


By receiving, opening the file package, and/or using MoBetes containing this software, you agree that this End User User License Agreement(EULA) is a legally binding and valid contract and agree to be bound by it. You agree to abide by the intellectual property laws and all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. Unless you have a different license agreement signed by MDH your use of MoBetes indicates your acceptance of this license agreement and warranty. Subject to the terms of this Agreement, MDH grants to you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license, without right to sub-license, to use MoBetes in accordance with this Agreement and any other written agreement with MDH. MDH does not transfer the title of MoBetes to you; the license granted to you is not a sale. This agreement is a binding legal agreement between MDH and the purchasers or users of MoBetes. If you do not agree to be bound by this agreement, remove MoBetes from your computer now and, if applicable, promptly return to MDH by mail any copies of MoBetes and related documentation and packaging in your possession.


2. DISTRIBUTION


MoBetes and the license herein granted shall not be copied, shared, distributed, re-sold, offered for re-sale, transferred or sub-licensed in whole or in part except that you may make one copy for archive purposes only. For information about redistribution of MoBetes contact MDH.


3. USER AGREEMENT


3.1 Use


Your license to use MoBetes is limited to the number of licenses purchased by you. You shall not allow others to use, copy or evaluate copies of MoBetes.


3.2 Use Restrictions


You shall use MoBetes in compliance with all applicable laws and not for any unlawful purpose. Without limiting the foregoing, use, display or distribution of MoBetes together with material that is pornographic, racist, vulgar, obscene, defamatory, libelous, abusive, promoting hatred, discriminating or displaying prejudice based on religion, ethnic heritage, race, sexual orientation or age is strictly prohibited. Each licensed copy of MoBetes may be used on one single computer location by one user. Use of MoBetes means that you have loaded, installed, or run MoBetes on a computer or similar device. If you install MoBetes onto a multi-user platform, server or network, each and every individual user of MoBetes must be licensed separately. You may make one copy of MoBetes for backup purposes, providing you only have one copy installed on one computer being used by one person. Other users may not use your copy of MoBetes . The assignment, sublicense, networking, sale, or distribution of copies of MoBetes are strictly forbidden without the prior written consent of MDH. It is a violation of this agreement to assign, sell, share, loan, rent, lease, borrow, network or transfer the use of MoBetes. If any person other than yourself uses MoBetes registered in your name, regardless of whether it is at the same time or different times, then this agreement is being violated and you are responsible for that violation!


3.3 Copyright Restriction


This Software contains copyrighted material, trade secrets and other proprietary material. You shall not, and shall not attempt to, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble or decompile MoBetes. Nor can you create any derivative works or other works that are based upon or derived from MoBetes in whole or in part. MDH name, logo and graphics file that represents MoBetes shall not be used in any way to promote products developed with MoBetes . MDH retains sole and exclusive ownership of all right, title and interest in and to MoBetes and all Intellectual Property rights relating thereto. Copyright law and international copyright treaty provisions protect all parts of MoBetes, products and services. No program, code, part, image, audio sample, or text may be copied or used in any way by the user except as intended within the bounds of the single user program. All rights not expressly granted hereunder are reserved for MDH.


3.4 Limitation of Responsibility


You will indemnify, hold harmless, and defend MDH , its employees, agents and distributors against any and all claims, proceedings, demand and costs resulting from or in any way connected with your use of MDH Software. In no event (including, without limitation, in the event of negligence) will MDH , its employees, agents or distributors be liable for any consequential, incidental, indirect, special or punitive damages whatsoever (including, without limitation, damages for loss of profits, loss of use, business interruption, loss of information or data, or pecuniary loss), in connection with or arising out of or related to this Agreement, MoBetes or the use or inability to use MoBetes or the furnishing, performance or use of any other matters hereunder whether based upon contract, tort or any other theory including negligence. MDH entire liability, without exception, is limited to the customers reimbursement of the purchase price of the Software (maximum being the lesser of the amount paid by you and the suggested retail price as listed by MDH ) in exchange for the return of the product, all copies, registration papers and manuals, and all materials that constitute a transfer of license from the customer back to MDH.


3.5 Warranties


Except as expressly stated in writing, MDH makes no representation or warranties in respect of this Software and expressly excludes all other warranties, expressed or implied, oral or written, including, without limitation, any implied warranties of merchantable quality or fitness for a particular purpose.


3.6 Governing Law


This Agreement shall be governed by the law of the Malaysia applicable therein. You hereby irrevocably attorn and submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia therefrom. If any provision shall be considered unlawful, void or otherwise unenforceable, then that provision shall be deemed severable from this License and not affect the validity and enforceability of any other provisions.


3.7 Termination


Any failure to comply with the terms and conditions of this Agreement will result in automatic and immediate termination of this license. Upon termination of this license granted herein for any reason, you agree to immediately cease use of MoBetes and destroy all copies of MoBetes supplied under this Agreement. The financial obligations incurred by you shall survive the expiration or termination of this license.


4. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY


THIS SOFTWARE AND THE ACCOMPANYING FILES ARE SOLD AS IS AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES AS TO PERFORMANCE OR MERCHANTABILITY OR ANY OTHER WARRANTIES WHETHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. THIS DISCLAIMER CONCERNS ALL FILES GENERATED AND EDITED BY MoBetes AS WELL.


5. CONSENT OF USE OF DATA


You agree that MDH may collect and use information gathered in any manner as part of the product support services provided to you, if any, related to MoBetes.MDH may also use this information to provide notices to you which may be of use or interest to you.
